url.title: Start URL
url.description: The URL to start crawling from (e.g., faculty page or directory).

maxDepth.title: Max Depth
maxDepth.description: How deep to crawl (e.g., 1 = follow links to profiles).

maxPages.title: Max Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl.

campaign.title: Campaign Name
campaign.description: Used to select a set of scraping rules (e.g., university_faculty).
